bulk-upload-candidates.unsaved: We have not been able to upload evidence
bulk-upload-candidates.maxFileSize: Select a file that is smaller than 25 MB
bulk-upload-candidates.fileType: This file is not a valid file format you can upload.
bulk-upload-candidates.invalidColumns: Please ensure you have at least the following columns in your CSV file: Name, Applicant ID, Job Role, Email Address
bulk-upload-candidates.missingValues: There are missing values in this file. Please check it to ensure no mandatory field values are missing.
bulk-upload-candidates.missingReference: Enter a value for Applicant ID or Job Role in each row in your CSV file.
bulk-upload-candidates.hasDuplicates: There are duplicate applications in this CSV file. Please remove any duplicates.
bulk-upload-candidates.emptyCsvSheet: This CSV file appears to be empty. Please upload a sheet with some data.
bulk-upload-candidates.hasBadApplicantId: Applicant IDs must only be numbers between 1 and 9 digits long. Please check all included IDs match this pattern.

confirm-data-checked.required: Confirm you have checked the data and it is correct.
